hero.title: Rahul Beniwal
hero.subtitle: Software Developer II
hero.summary: Skilled software developer with expertise in Python, Django, and backend technologies. Experienced in building scalable web apps and handling configuration-driven projects. A quick problem solver with a solid understanding of web technologies, known for delivering efficient, reliable solutions.

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer II
highlights: Led end-to-end integration with Verizon for Internet Services
Built APIs supporting 20+ charts, 30+ graphs, and 20+ reports
Optimized database queries, reducing response time from 3 minutes to 3 seconds
Designed data models and REST APIs for Property Management Service
Achieved up to 100% faster ORM query performance
Developed robust, flexible caching utilities for Django models
Integrated multiple services including Regal, Iterable, Verse, and IBEX

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Designed and implemented a JSON-configured secure proxy system for API interactions
Implemented an independent payment management service

professionalExperience.title: Software Developer Intern
highlights: Developed client-facing APIs for business loan dashboards
Created scheduled jobs to synchronize systems

projects.name: LAAIT Programming Language
projects.description: A lightweight interpreter featuring dynamic typing, lexical scoping, and first-class functions. Implemented in Go, it includes a recursive descent parser and tree-walk interpreter.

projects.name: Rust Blockchain
projects.description: A blockchain implementation in Rust with proof-of-work consensus, focusing on core blockchain concepts and Rust's memory safety features.

projects.name: K&R C Solutions
projects.description: Implementation of solutions from the C Programming Language book (K&R), focusing on problem-solving and UNIX philosophy.
